scripts.android:build:bundle:dev: yarn env:dev  && yarn android:bundle:debug && cd android && gradlew bundleRelease --warning-mode all
scripts.android:build:bundle:prod: yarn env:prod && yarn android:bundle:release && cd android && gradlew bundleRelease --warning-mode all
scripts.android:build:apk:dev: yarn android:bundle:release && cd android && gradlew assembleRelease --warning-mode all
scripts.android:build:apk:prod: yarn env:prod && yarn android:bundle:release && cd android && gradlew assembleRelease --warning-mode all
scripts.android:bundle:debug: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/
scripts.devjsmap: react-native bundle --platform android --entry-file index.js --dev false --reset-cache --bundle-output /tmp/bundle.android.js --assets-dest /tmp/ --sourcemap-output index.android.js.map
